newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Rob Morrison named new chief executive of BTNZ.
newsitem.headline: Rob Morrison named new chief executive of BTNZ.

text.p: Bankers Trust New Zealand on Friday named Rob Morrison as its new chief executive officer and John Macfarlane as deputy chief executive.
The appointments follow the move of BTNZ's former chief executive Gavin Walker to Sydney to head the Investment Bank division of Bankers Trust Australia.
